ygData.subject: Re: ARK
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She fell to her knees and cried.  She couldn t help but feel broken sparked.  She knew that she had doomed her love, her friends.  Any hope of the future

::Spears:;

She fell to her knees and cried.  She couldn't help but feel broken 
sparked.  She knew that she had doomed her love, her friends.  Any 
hope of the future for her and Striker.  She stood up and looked into 
the hole at Striker, hanging on the wall.  She whispered to him, "I'm 
sorry my love. I tried to do what I thought would save you. I'm 
sorry."  She just looked at him and cried. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Prebon
> 
> Prebon laughed.
> 
> "Excellent! Now, here is the plan. In a few days we'll all go on a 
> scout mission at The Ark. You'll tell us which one is Ramulus. I 
than 
> threaten to kill you if he doesn't meet me one on one. If he does, 
> Striker goes home. If he doesn't, Striker gets the chip. If Ramulus 
> does meet me, than I give him the chip and use him as my middle man 
> to control the Maximals! You may go. You can look at Striker all 
you 
> want. But if he wakes up, no mentioning of what I have just told 
you. 
> The only thing I will alow you to say is "I am Master Prebon's 
now." 
> As soon as he wakes up tell me, so the torture can begin. No 
leaving 
> the ship without my permission and no helping him to escape!" 
Prebon 
> was about to walk away, but he turned back.
> 
> "Oh, and I hope you know what you've gotten yourself into. I said 
> Striker would go. Not you. To save him you have sacrificed a future 
> with him. You could've been with him forever, but you decided to 
sell 
> out your friends and lose your love. Have a nice day!"
> 
> Prebon left her laughing.
